str2: Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To accompany, attend, follow. Properly, to be in the same way with, i.e. To accompany.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From a (long) distance, afar. Adverb from makros; from a distance or afar.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Within, inside, with verbs either of rest or of motion; prep: within, to within, inside. From eis; inside.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as aer; a yard; by implication, a mansion.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
High priest, chief priest. From arche and hiereus; the high-priest; by extension a chief priest.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To sit with. From sun and kathemai; to seat oneself in company with.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From hupo and a derivative of eresso; an under-oarsman, i.e. subordinate.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To warm; mid: I warm myself. From therme; to heat.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
